t: Who can create a Brand Store?
Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: No. You can create a single, global account with Brand Registry. During enrollment, you’ll only be able to select a single country-based trademark office. But you’ll be able add trademarks for the offices of other countries after your enrollment has been approved.

t: Amazon brand usage guidelines for 3-party display ads | Amazon Ads
s: 1. In order to prevent customer confusion between what is the site and what is an advertisement, branded buttons are not allowed (Advertiser branded buttons or Amazon text links only).

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Creating and maintaining a Brand Store is free, and you do not need to advertise on Amazon to create a Brand Store. Once you create a Brand Store, you can showcase your products, brand story, and lifestyle content to engage shoppers.
